text: John Edward "Sonny" Ruberto (January 2, 1946 - March 25, 2014) was an American baseball backup catcher and pinch runner. He played in the Major League Baseball (MLB) and played two seasons for the San Diego Padres (1969) and the Cincinnati Reds (1972). He was born in the Staten Island borough of New York City, New York. Ruberto died from cancer on March 25, 2014 in Ave Maria, Florida. He was 68 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Sonny Ruberto at Baseball Reference Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American baseball players Category:Cancer deaths in Florida Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:San Diego Padres players Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Sonny Ruberto
